text: tavada “api madinavata apasu pæminiyahot gauravaniya ayayi. (visvasaya tæbu mema) dinavu ayava eyin niyata vasayenma pitamam karanu labannaha” yayi ovun pavasannaha. (nabiye! oba mese pavasanu): “siyalu gauravayan allahtada, ohuge dutayatada, visvasavantayintada ayat dæyayi”. ehet mema vamcanikayin (eya) dæna ganne næta
